body_html: Not really. The only thing we could do would be to batch the ops a bit more across scalars, but it won't give you a large speedup. Computing full hessian is very very expensive, which is why all these tricks for estimating it exist.

body: Not really. The only thing we could do would be to batch the ops a bit more across scalars, but it won't give you a large speedup. Computing full hessian is very very expensive, which is why all these tricks for estimating it exist.
